title: Apple Vision Pro 2 Launches at $2,499 – Pre-Orders Surpass 5 Million Units in First Week
shortdescription: Tim Cook's spatial computing vision takes off as Apple stock hits $250 per share on record pre-orders.
description: Pre-orders exceed 5M units in first week, Apple shares surge to $250 — Vision Pro 2 becomes fastest-selling Apple product ever.
author: Wade Jenner

title: NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang Joins $200 Billion Club After AI Chip Boom
shortdescription: Huang now richer than Google founders combined as NVDA market cap crosses $4 trillion.
description: Blackwell chip delays resolved, data center revenue up 400% — Jensen's wealth grows $2B per week.
author: Wade Jenner

title: Mukesh Ambani Becomes First Asian Worth $200 Billion
shortdescription: Reliance Jio + Retail empire valued at $400B+ as India becomes world's 3rd largest economy.
description: Jio 5G rollout complete, Reliance Retail expands to 100,000 stores — Ambani overtakes Larry Ellison.
author: Wade Jenner
